enable_custom_text_styling.label: Enable custom styling
enable_custom_text_styling.info: This will overwrite the heading settings above.
enable_custom_text_styling.text_info: This will overwrite the text styling.

title.label: Heading
title.info: To add an underline, select the text and press Ctrl + U for Windows and Linux or Cmd + U for Mac.

secondary_font_gradient.label: Secondary font in accent gradient color

show_arrow.label: Show arrow
show_arrow.info: Only applicable when ‘Compact layout’ setting is enabled and button style is set to ‘Link’.

link_text.label: Label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - images.

fix_zindex.label: Control the stacking order of sections
fix_zindex.info: Increase or decrease the z-index value to control the visual layering of sections, ensuring the desired display arrangement when using negative spacing. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8372493-z-index-settings)

background_gradient.label: Background gradient
background_gradient.info: Gradient overrules the solid background color. Only applicable when ‘Enable custom background color’ is enabled.

background_color_section.label: Enable color scheme for section
background_color_section.info: Apply the background color scheme to the content in this section, like the typography and buttons.

enable_controls.label: Show play button
enable_controls.info: Only applicable when using video content.

video_mute.label: Mute video
video_mute.info: Only applicable when showing a play button

darkmode_logo.label: Logo image for dark mode
darkmode_logo.info: Make sure this logo image has the same dimensions as the regular logo image.

mobile_logo.label: Mobile logo image
mobile_logo.info: Leave empty if you want to use the same logo as uploaded for desktop. The logo is always centered on mobile.

mobile_darkmode_logo.label: Mobile logo image for dark mode
mobile_darkmode_logo.info: Make sure this logo image has the same dimensions as the regular mobile logo image.

width.label: Content maximum width
width.info: When you choose 2000px, the content will be full width.

everything_rounded.label: Show all elements with round corners
everything_rounded.info: This will add round corners to all styled elements like checkboxes, selectors, boxes, labels and searchbar.

gutter.label: Gap
gutter.info: This is the space between the content inside the banners.

enable_animations.label: Enable animations
enable_animations.info: This will enable animations on the theme.

primary_bg_gradient.label: Primary background gradient
primary_bg_gradient.info: Primary background gradient replaces primary background color where possible.

title_color_gradient.label: Headings gradient
title_color_gradient.info: Headings gradient replaces headings color where possible.

accent_gradient.label: Accent gradient
accent_gradient.info: Accent gradient replaces accent color where possible.

default_color_scheme.label: Default color scheme
default_color_scheme.info: This color scheme will be used for all sections and pages that don't have a specific color scheme set.

dropdown_color.label: Menus and drawers
dropdown_color.info: This is the color scheme of your mega menu or dropdown menu. Search drawer, side cart, filters, shop the look drawer, quickshop cart, other drawers and dropdowns will automatically use this color scheme.

active_tabs_color.label: Active tabs
active_tabs_color.info: This is the color scheme of active tabs in content blocks on the productpage and in the section 'content tabs'.

product_label.paragraph: Click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8789852-products) for information about adding labels.

color_swatch_name.label: Color swatches name
color_swatch_name.info: The option name used for the color swatches, for example 'Color' or 'Colour'. You can add multiple names by entering each on a separate line.

color_swatch_hexes.label: Custom colors
color_swatch_hexes.info: For each color: enter on a separate line the name of the color, then a colon (:) followed by the hex code (for example: Red: #DC143C). Leave out the hex code to use a custom image instead.

custom_fonts.paragraph: Custom fonts can be added in two ways: by uploading a font file or by using an Adobe font snippet. [More info](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8817864-typography-and-custom-fonts)

custom_primary_font_file.label: Custom primary font file
custom_primary_font_file.info: Upload your font file in the 'Files' section of your Shopify admin.

custom_primary_font_snippet.label: Custom primary font snippet
custom_primary_font_snippet.info: The snippet looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/abc123.css">

custom_secondary_font_file.label: Custom secondary font file
custom_secondary_font_file.info: Upload your font file in the 'Files' section of your Shopify admin.

custom_secondary_font_snippet.label: Custom secondary font snippet
custom_secondary_font_snippet.info: The snippet looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/abc123.css">

fonts.paragraph: Not all font families support multiple font weights.

global_title_size.label: Default heading font size
global_title_size.info: Applicable to static pages like the account login and register pages.

custom_product_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_product_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

multiply.paragraph: Apply this effect on your product or collection images, it will hide the white background. Recommended when using a colored general background and images with a white background.

multiply_product_images.label: Pass through colors on product images

options__3.label: Enable pass through with a background color

multiply_product_images_color_palette.label: Pass through colors on product images background color
multiply_product_images_color_palette.info: Only applicable when 'Enable pass through with a background color' is selected.

multiply_collection_images.label: Pass through colors on collection images

options__3.label: Enable pass through with a background color

multiply_collection_images_color_palette.label: Pass through colors on collection images background color
multiply_collection_images_color_palette.info: Only applicable when 'Enable pass through with a background color' is selected.

banners_clickable.label: Clickable images
banners_clickable.info: Enable this to make images clickable instead of only a clickable link, for example in a banner.

button_border.label: Border thickness
button_border.info: Only applicable when 'no fill' is selected.

enable_cart_drawer.label: Enable cart drawer
enable_cart_drawer.info: When adding products to the cart or when clicking the cart icon in the header, this will open a cart side drawer instead of redirecting to the cart page.

enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove.label: Enable undo deleted products
enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove.info: Enable this if you want to give a visitor the option if a product is removed, it can be undone.

enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove_delay.label: Enable timer for undo deleted products
enable_cart_drawer_undo_remove_delay.info: This will show the undo feature for a certain amount of seconds.

search_drawer_enable_collections.label: Collections
search_drawer_enable_collections.info: Collection results are supported on a limited number of languages. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8353097-search-drawer)

search_drawer_popular_collections_title.label: Heading
search_drawer_popular_collections_title.info: Promote popular collections and/or important products when search bar is empty.

background_opacity.label: Background opacity
background_opacity.info: Only applicable when ‘Variant picker’ is selected in ‘LAYOUT’.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button label.

show_stock_label.label: Show 'Last stock!' on products
show_stock_label.info: When stock is running low on a product, inform your visitors about this. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272209-products)

stock_label_qty.label: Stock level to show ‘Last stock!’ label

product_custom_label.label: Metafield: custom label
product_custom_label.info: Create a metafield for a custom label and enter the namespace and key here (e.g. custom.label) [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272209-products)

show_product_stock_qty.label: Stock level to show available product stock
show_product_stock_qty.info: You can also check 'always show available product stock' below to override this.

show_product_stock_continuous_selling.label: Show 'out of stock' for backorder products

product_short_description.label: Show product short description
product_short_description.info: Show a part of the product description or use a custom text.

product_short_description_text.label: Metafield: custom short description
product_short_description_text.info: Create a metafield for a custom short description and enter the namespace and key here (e.g. custom.short_description) [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272209-products)

cart_icon_no_text.label: Show cart icon
cart_icon_no_text.info: This will show a cart icon instead of ‘+’-icon.

image_behaviour.label: Product card image behaviour
image_behaviour.info: Slider is only applicable on collection pages.

show_price_varies.label: Show price range on product cards
show_price_varies.info: When different variants of a product have a different price range, this will show on your product card.

enable_product_ratings.label: Show product ratings
enable_product_ratings.info: The ratings will be automatically pulled from your review app.

color_swatch_behavior.label: Color swatches behaviour
color_swatch_behavior.info: ‘On hover’ is not applicable when 'Quickshop' layout with a 'Static' behaviour is selected.

color_swatches_single.label: Hide color swatches when product has only one color variant

color_swatches_variant_image.label: Show variant images instead of colors

enable_free_shipping.label: Enable free shipping
enable_free_shipping.info: Note that this feature does not work well when multi-currency is enabled. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272208-shipping-and-delivery)

free_shipping_amount.label: Minimum order amount to free shipping

deliverytime.paragraph: Use metafields to show product delivery times. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272208-shipping-and-delivery)
deliverytime.paragraph__2: Do you want to show default deliverytimes for products where no delivery time-metafield is set up? Enter them below.

default_product_deliverytime_info.label: Default extra info for deliverytime
default_product_deliverytime_info.info: This will show an info icon next to your delivery- and shipping messages on productcards and productpage. The text will show in a popup.

show_deliverytime_always.label: Show delivery time for products without inventory tracking
show_deliverytime_always.info: When inventory tracking is disabled for a product, the 'in stock' delivery time will be shown.

shipping_timer.paragraph: If you handle ‘same day shipping’, show a timer how much time visitors have left to order your products to be shipped today.

shipping_timer_show_until.label: Before what time should your customers order?

shipping_timer_show_from.label: Starting from what time should the timer show up on your page?

shipping_timer.paragraph__2: On which days do you want to show the timer?

settings.paragraph: You can set up your social links in the ['Brand' page](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/managing-brand-assets) in the Shopify settings, but you can also choose to connect them here.

newsletter_popup_testmode.label: Enable test mode
newsletter_popup_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing the popup. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

age_verify_popup_testmode.label: Enable test mode
age_verify_popup_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing the popup. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

age_verify_popup_cookie_text.label: Cookies text (optional)
age_verify_popup_cookie_text.info: The text will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

denied.paragraph: This will display when the customer has declined the age verification.

settings.paragraph: The cookie popup will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged, and if no age verification popup is enabled. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

cookiebanner_testmode.label: Enable test mode
cookiebanner_testmode.info: This shows the popup on every refresh, you should only use this for editing. Make sure 'Test mode' is disabled when publishing your theme.

cookiebanner_text.label: Text
cookiebanner_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

custom_script_for_head.label: Custom script for head tag
custom_script_for_head.info: This setting allows you to insert scripts into the head tag of the theme code.

custom_script_for_body.label: Custom script for body tag
custom_script_for_body.info: This setting allows you to insert scripts into the body tag of the theme code.

settings.paragraph: Edit dark mode logos in the 'Logos' tab in the general theme settings. Edit the dark mode toggle in theme editor - sections - ‘header’.

enable_darkmode.label: Standard mode
enable_darkmode.info: Dark mode uses less energy from screens.

options__4.label: Normal mode and dark mode on timer

darkmode_timer_end.label: Dark mode timer stop
darkmode_timer_end.info: Only applicable when dark mode timer is on.

cols.label: Columns
cols.info: If columns per row '4' is selected, values above 4 will be ignored.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - images.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

custom_height.label: Custom height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when ‘custom minimal height’ is enabled.

image_zoom.label: Show zoom effect on hover on banner images
Show zoom effect on hover on banner images

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - images.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

video_alt_text.label: Video alt text
video_alt_text.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when image ratio is set to 100%.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

height.label: Height
height.info: Full height is only applicable in combination with a transparent header.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

width.label: Width
width.info: Transparant header is only applicable with a full width slideshow.

enable_controls.label: Show play / pause button
enable_controls.info: Only applicable when autoplay is enabled

image.label: Image
image.info: Slideshow can be used in three different layouts. For more information and recommended image sizes [click here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272151-section-slideshow).

image_width.label: Image/video width
image_width.info: Only applicable when ‘Image left, content right' or 'image right, content left’ is selected.

settings.paragraph: The following inputs are required for the form to submit successfully: Email and either a Message or Text input.

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Only applicable when 'compact view' is enabled

settings.paragraph: You can fill in maximum 6 options. If you want less options, fill in less. Not all 6 are required.
You can fill in maximum 6 options. If you want less options, fill in less. Not all 6 are required.

number_of_items.label: Logos per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more logos than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272172-section-brand-logo-slider)

image.label: Background image (optional)
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272173-section-newsletter)

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272174-section-recently-viewed-products)

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

transparent.label: Enable transparent header
transparent.info: Only applicable when used as first section and when full width is selected.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: More information on the layouts can be found [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8487537-static-section).

options__11.label: Playful with three images and video

images.paragraph: Upload your images and choose a layout above that suits your needs.

video.paragraph: Select a video file and choose a layout that includes video of choice.

transparent.label: Enable transparent header
transparent.info: Only applicable when used as first section and when full width is selected.

media_mobile_height.label: Media height
media_mobile_height.info: Only applicable when 'Grid' and 'Slideshow' are selected.

custom_title_size.label: Custom font size
custom_title_size.info: Only applicable when 'Enable custom font size' is enabled.

link_text_2.label: Second button label
link_text_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the image will be full width.

image_height.label: Image height
image_height.info: Only applicable when 'Constrain proportions' is disabled.

mobile_sizes.label: Custom mobile image size
mobile_sizes.info: Only applicable when 'Flexible' layout is selected

image_height.label: Video height
image_height.info: Only applicable when 'Constrain proportions' is disabled.

mobile_sizes.label: Custom mobile video size
mobile_sizes.info: Only applicable when 'Flexible' layout is selected

background_color_section.info: Apply the background color scheme to the text in this section.

custom_title_size.label: Custom font size
custom_title_size.info: Only applicable when 'Enable custom font size' is enabled.

custom_height.label: Custom minimal height
custom_height.info: Only applicable when 'custom minimal height' is enabled.

image_width.label: Image width
image_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the image will be full width.

video_width.label: Video width
video_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the video will be full width.

items_width.label: Testimonials per row
items_width.info: Only applicable when ‘Rows’ layout is selected.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

initials_color_palette.label: Initials color scheme
initials_color_palette.info: Only applicable when there is no image added.

author.label: Author
author.info: Leave blank when the author is anonymous.

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272180-section-featured-collection)

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272184-section-featured-products)

show_read_more.label: Show a 'read more' link which links to the product page or opens the product description in a drawer.

usp.label: Text
usp.info: When the line of text is longer than the screen width can handle, it will show a ‘more info’ link that opens a popup.

content_width.label: Max. content width
content_width.info: Only applicable when content position left or center is selected.

image_width.label: Max image/video width
image_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the image/video will be full width.

faq_question.label: Heading
faq_question.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

content.paragraph: All content can be filled static or with metafields. All content can be used seperate or together in this block. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272181-section-collapsible-content)

show_contact_form.label: Show contact form
show_contact_form.info: A standard contact form will appear below the content.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

custom_html.label: Custom HTML
custom_html.info: Add app snippets, embed code or other HTML code to create advanced customizations.

settings.paragraph: The announcement bar will remain visible in the theme editor after clicking the 'close' icon. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272220-announcement-bar)

custom_icons.info: Upload custom icons for the cart, account, search and hamburger menu.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: More information on header layouts can be found [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272222-header-settings).

options__1.label: Logo left, in-header navigation, compact search

options__2.label: Logo left, menubar, extended search left

options__3.label: Logo left, menubar, extended search right

options__5.label: Logo center, in-header navigation, compact search

options__6.label: Logo center, menubar, extended search left

width.label: Width
width.info: When you choose 2000px, the header will be full width.

topbar_extra_menu_item.label: Extra menu item in top bar

topbar_extra_menu_item_link_styling.label: Extra menu item in top bar link styling

information.paragraph: Add information using blocks in the sections area.

logo.paragraph: Edit logo images in the 'Logos' tab in the general theme settings.

transparent_header.paragraph: Only applicable with Flexible section, Static section and Slideshow section.

darkmode_toggle.label: Show dark mode toggle
darkmode_toggle.info: Visitors can choose whether to show dark mode or normal mode. To setup dark mode and the dark mode timer go to ‘Theme settings’ - Dark mode in the theme editor.

show_dropdown_images.label: Show collection images in menus
show_dropdown_images.info: Show the collection image before the title.

show_dropdown_images_autofill.label: Auto-fill collection images
show_dropdown_images_autofill.info: Automatically use the first product images when missing the collection image.

show_dropdown_images_rounded.label: Show collection images in a circle

menu_recently_viewed_products.label: Show recently viewed products in mega menu

menubar_alignment.label: Alignment menu items
menubar_alignment.info: Only applicable when ‘menubar’ is enabled in header layout.

menu_border_width.label: Menubar borders width
menu_border_width.info: Only applicable when 'show menubar borders' is enabled and when transparent header is disabled.

menu_items_limit.label: Submenu items per column
menu_items_limit.info: The last submenu items will be followed by a 'show more' link in the megamenu

darkmode_extra_image.label: Image for dark mode
darkmode_extra_image.info: Make sure this image has the same dimensions as the regular image.

enable_socials.label: Show social media accounts
enable_socials.info: For more info on how to connect your social media accounts click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272207-social-media).

logo_height_mobile.label: Mobile logo height
logo_height_mobile.info: To keep the header layout as optimized as possible, the logo has a maximum height of 50px.

usp.label: Heading
usp.info: When the line of text is longer than the screen width can handle, it will show a ‘more info’ link that opens a popup.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Copy and paste the name of an item created in your menu to create a dropdown menu. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272222-header-settings)

layout.label: Banner layout
layout.info: Only applicable when both banners are enabled.

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Copy and paste the name of an item created in your menu to create a dropdown menu. [Read more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272222-header-settings)

enable_country_selector.label: Show country selector
enable_country_selector.info: Make sure 'show country selector' is enabled in the header settings.

enable_language_selector.label: Show language selector
enable_language_selector.info: Make sure 'show language selector' is enabled in the header settings.

bottom_img.label: Image
bottom_img.info: A logo or a trustmark is commonly used for the footer bottom bar.

enable_follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop
enable_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

split_menu.label: Split menu
split_menu.info: This will show a large menu in two parts, the other blocks will always be shown first.

newsletter_terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
newsletter_terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

customer_support_img.label: Image
customer_support_img.info: For best results use an image with a max. width of 320px.

text.label: Text
text.info: Do you want to show any other info about your company? You can show the opening hours here, for example.

enable_follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on Shop
enable_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

settings.paragraph: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products#recommendation-logic)

number_of_items.label: Products per row
number_of_items.info: If list includes more products than shown, it will be a slider automatically. Swipe is automatically activated on mobile. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8487547-product-recommendation-section)

background_color_section.info: Apply the background color scheme to the text in this section.

text_alignment.label: Heading position
text_alignment.info: If ‘Next to the products’ is selected, it shows a max of 3 products per row.

settings.paragraph: Make sure you install [Shopify's free Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app before enabling this section.

google_maps_iframe.label: Google Maps embed code
google_maps_iframe.info: Show your shops' location in Google Maps. You can find the embed code by searching your store in Google Maps, clicking 'Share' and then choosing 'Embed a map'. [Learn more](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/144361)

enable.label: Enable sticky add to cart bar
enable.info: Not applicable for products with more than 250 variants.

hide_in_theme_editor.label: Hide sticky add to cart bar in the theme editor

custom_product_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_product_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

fill_not_first.label: Do not fill first image
fill_not_first.info: Only applicable when 'Fill images' is enabled.

show_product_description_drawer.label: Show product description in drawer
show_product_description_drawer.info: Only applicable when ‘Short product description block’ is added.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

custom_html.label: Custom HTML
custom_html.info: Add app snippets, embed code or other HTML code to create advanced customizations.

title.label: Custom title
title.info: Leave empty to show the product title.

layout_mobile.label: Layout
layout_mobile.info: This changes the position of the product title based on the main product image.

settings.paragraph: It will show like this when both selected: Vendor Vendor name
Quantity rules is only available for Shopify Plus merchants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/b2b/catalogs/quantity-pricing)
settings.paragraph-2: A placeholder text will be shown in the theme editor. The text will be replaced by the actual quantity rules when the product is published.

settings.paragraph: Volume pricing is only available for Shopify Plus merchants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/b2b/catalogs/quantity-pricing)
settings.paragraph-2: A placeholder text will be shown in the theme editor. The text will be replaced by the actual volume pricing when the product is published.

show_read_more.label: Show a 'read more' link which scrolls to the product description or opens the product description in a drawer.
show_read_more.info: Only applicable when ‘Show product description’ is enabled.

settings.paragraph: Check out the general theme settings to set up a custom short description. You can find the settings under the tab named 'Products'.

collapse.label: Collapse by default
collapse.info: Only applicable when 'Accordion' layout is selected.

title_size.info: Only applicable when 'Regular' layout is selected.

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Products'.

options.label: Enable separate option pickers
options.info: [Combined listing](https://apps.shopify.com/combined-listings) products will always show separate option pickers.

button_options.label: Always show buttons for option(s)
button_options.info: The option name(s) that should always use variant picker type 'buttons', for example 'Color'. You can use multiple names by entering them on separate lines.

dropdown_options.label: Always show a dropdown for option(s)
dropdown_options.info: The option name(s) that should always use variant picker type 'dropdown', for example 'Size'. You can use multiple names by entering them on separate lines.

show_variant_one_available.label: Show variant picker when product has only one variant
show_variant_one_available.info: By default the variant picker disappears if only one variant is available.

show_unavailable_variants.label: Show unavailable variants
show_unavailable_variants.info: Unavailable variants can only be hidden when separate option pickers are not applicable for the product.

enable_selling_plans.label: Enable subscriptions
enable_selling_plans.info: For more information on how to set up subscriptions [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/purchase-options/subscriptions).

show_selected_variant_images.label: Show only images of the selected variant

selected_variant_images_source.label: Variant images source
selected_variant_images_source.info: Default variant images are only applicable when color swatches are active. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272191-product-page) about both options.

variant_images_metafield.label: Metafield key for variant images
variant_images_metafield.info: Provide the namespace and key of the variant metafield that contains image files (e.g. custom.images).

settings.paragraph: The ratings will be automatically shown from your review app!
The reviews will be automatically shown from your review app!
For more information about how to set up local pickup, click [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup).

enable_contactform.label: Show contact form
enable_contactform.info: A standard contact form will appear in a drawer. This will overrule the button link.

size_name.label: Size name
size_name.info: The option name used for the size, for example 'Size' or 'Sizing'. You can add multiple names by entering each on a separate line.

hide_one_variant.label: Hide size chart when product has only one variant

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Shipping and delivery'.

title_size.label: Heading size
title_size.info: Only applicable when 'regular' layout is chosen.

header_image_svg.label: Use .svg format
header_image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

content.paragraph: All content can be filled static or with metafields. All content can be used seperate or together in this block. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272191-product-page)

show_contact_form.label: Show contact form
show_contact_form.info: A standard contact form will appear below the content.

settings.paragraph: This block only works with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. If no additional products are set, placeholder products will be shown (only in the theme editor). To select complementary products add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

title_size.label: Heading size
title_size.info: Only applicable when 'regular' layout is chosen.

icon.info: Icon uses highlight color for accents.

header_image_svg.label: Use .svg format
header_image_svg.info: Upload your .svg file in 'Files' in the Shopify admin and paste the url to the file here. More info on how to upload the file can be found [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-online/online-store/file-uploads).

quick_buy.paragraph: This will show an ‘add to cart’ button on your product card.

enable_quick_buy_drawer.label: Enable quick shop drawer
enable_quick_buy_drawer.info: This will open a compact version of the productpage in a side drawer.

enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.label: Show amount selector
enable_quick_buy_qty_selector.info: Not applicable when quick shop drawer is enabled.

enable_quick_buy_compact.label: Enable compact button
enable_quick_buy_compact.info: This will show a shopping cart icon instead 'Add to cart', or just 'Options' instead of 'View options'.

products_layout.paragraph: If used, show the following information on the product cards.

show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button
show_dynamic_buybutton.info: Customers will see their preferred payment method, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/dynamic-checkout)

button_style_dynamic_buybutton.label: Dynamic buy button styling
button_style_dynamic_buybutton.info: Not applicable for all dynamic buy buttons.

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

text.label: Information
text.info: This information appears when the visitor clicks on the ‘I’ icon next to the heading.

true_size_value.label: Selected option
true_size_value.info: Provide one of the options above to let customers know if this product is true to size. A metafield can be linked to this field. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272191-product-page)

fill_not_first.label: Do not fill first image
fill_not_first.info: Only applicable when 'Fill images' is enabled.

banner_position_row.label: Show image banner every:
banner_position_row.info: Only applicable when using 'image banner' among your products. You can add as many banners as required.

filter_menu.label: Menu
filter_menu.info: A menu which will be used to display related collections. Click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272192-collections) for more info on how to build this menu.

collections_menu.label: Collections
collections_menu.info: Select related collections and/or choose a menu above. Duplicate items will be hidden automatically.

filters_show_more_limit.label: Enable 'Show more' link after amount of filters

filter_swatches.paragraph: For more information on how to set up visual filters [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters).

image_swatches_show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
image_swatches_show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when 'Fill images' is enabled.

title.label: Custom title
title.info: Leave empty to show the collection title.

text.label: Custom description
text.info: Leave empty to show the collection description.

link_text.label: Button label
link_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button. Only applicable when ‘clickable images’ setting is enabled in theme settings - images.

products_per_row.label: Products per row
products_per_row.info: Only applicable for the product card layout 'Grid'.

filter_menu.label: Menu
filter_menu.info: A menu which will be used to display collections. Click [here](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272192-collections) for more info on how to build this menu.

collections_menu.label: Collections
collections_menu.info: Select related collections and/or choose a menu above. Duplicate items will be hidden automatically.

filters_show_more_limit.label: Enable 'Show more' link after amount of filters

filter_swatches.paragraph: For more information on how to set up visual filters [click here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters).

image_swatches_show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
image_swatches_show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when 'Fill images' is enabled.

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_tags.label: Show tags
show_tags.info: Only applicable when 'show featured image' is enabled

max_width.label: Content maximum width
max_width.info: When you choose 1280px, the content will be full width.

title.label: Custom heading
title.info: Leave empty to show the blog title.

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_tags.label: Show tags
show_tags.info: Only applicable when 'show featured image' is enabled

show_banner.label: Show title in full width banner
show_banner.info: This will show your title in a banner over the Blog post featured image.

custom_image_ratio.label: Image ratio
custom_image_ratio.info: For landscape images, select 75%. For square, select 100%. For portrait, select 125%.

show_in_circle.label: Show images in circle
show_in_circle.info: Only applicable when image ratio is set to 100%.

show_dynamic_buybutton.label: Show dynamic buy button
show_dynamic_buybutton.info: Customers will see their preferred payment method, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/dynamic-checkout)

terms_text.label: Label for the checkbox
terms_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

settings.paragraph: You can find the settings in the general theme settings under the tab named 'Shipping and delivery'.
Customize your form texts in the theme translations. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/language/translate-theme)

custom_checkbox_text.label: Label for the checkbox
custom_checkbox_text.info: For example, place a link to your privacy policy.

image.label: Background
image.info: For best results with full background setting, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://intercom.help/someoneyouknow/en/articles/8272196-404-page)

settings.paragraph: Customize your message in the 'Preferences' section of your Online Store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/password-page#add-password-protection-to-your-online-store)
Customize your form texts in the theme translations. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/language/translate-theme)
Customize your form texts in the theme translations. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/language/translate-theme)

show_logo_giftcard.label: Show logo / shop name on the giftcard
